flawed_nl_solution:
They sold $200 worth of cars each month because 4 x 50 = <<4*50=200>>200
They made $100 a month off cars because 200 - 100 = <<200-100=100>>100
They sold $4000 worth of motorcycles each month because 8 x 50 = <<8*50=4000>>4000
They make $3750 a month off motorcycles because 4000 - 250 = <<4000-250=3750>>3750
They make $3650 more a month off motorcycles than cars because 3750 - 100 = <<3750-100=3650>>3650
#### 3650

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 400, not 4000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
